name: pauls-pure-functions
description: A growing library of useful functions for data manipulation in JavaScript. Also abstractions to help with everyday web development, working with URL queries, network requests, promises, etc.

scripts.build: npm run cjs_dir && npm run cjs_index && npm run __dir
scripts.__dir: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf __ && parcel build esm/* && mv dist __
scripts.cjs_dir: rm -rf cjs && rollup esm/*.js --format cjs --dir cjs/ --exports auto
scripts.cjs_index: rm -rf index.cjs && rollup index.mjs --format cjs --file index.cjs --exports auto
